text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
  <INTRO>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende B\u221a\u00bacher in gar geringem Prei\u221a\u00fc zu haben, als:</INTRO>
  <BIBL n="1">
    <AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1680</YEAR>
    <NOTE>das Eremplar in albo achthalben</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="2">
    <AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1703</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE_ALTERNATE>auf Schreib-papier 14. Batzen.</PRIZE_ALTERNATE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="3">
    <AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1713</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="4">
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Carechetischer Le\u221a\u00bachter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erkl\u221a\u00a7rung und Gebatt \u221a\u00baber den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1711</YEAR>
    <NOTE>mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="5">
    <TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE>
    <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="6">
    <AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete un\u221a\u00baberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE>
    <SUBTITLE>gr\u221a\u00bandlich vorgestellt \u221a\u00baber die Worte des 125. Pfalms</SUBTITLE>
    <FORMAT>9. 1.</FORMAT>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1704</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
","number_of_corrections":4,"explanation":"Corrections made:
1) Added XML declaration. 
2) Wrapped the initial free text into an <INTRO> element to make the ITEM content well-formed XML.
3) Added an n="#" attribute to each <BIBL> entry so the original enumerated list (1., 2., ...) is preserved as structured data.
4) Fixed a mismatched closing tag (</PRICE> -> </PRIZE>) and normalized PRIZE usage. 
I preserved the original text contents (including original unicode escapes) and added small structural elements (<NOTE>, <PRIZE_ALTERNATE>, <SUBTITLE>) where it seemed sensible to capture information that had been free text inside entries."}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>

  <BIBL n="2">

    <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1703</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE_ALTERNATE>auf Schreib-papier 14. Batzen.</PRIZE_ALTERNATE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="3">
    <AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1713</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="4">
    <AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Carechetischer Le\u221a\u00bachter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erkl\u221a\u00a7rung und Gebatt \u221a\u00baber den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1711</YEAR>
    <NOTE>mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet</NOTE>
    <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="5">
    <TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE>
    <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL n="6">
    <AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete un\u221a\u00baberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE>
    <SUBTITLE>gr\u221a\u00bandlich vorgestellt \u221a\u00baber die Worte des 125. Pfalms</SUBTITLE>
    <FORMAT>9. 1.</FORMAT>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1704</YEAR>
    <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
Corrections made:
1) Added XML declaration. 
2) Wrapped the initial free text into an <INTRO> element to make the ITEM content well-formed XML.
3) Added an n="#" attribute to each <BIBL> entry so the original enumerated list (1., 2., ...) is preserved as structured data.
4) Fixed a mismatched closing tag (</PRICE> -> </PRIZE>) and normalized PRIZE usage. 
I preserved the original text contents (including original unicode escapes) and added small structural elements (<NOTE>, <PRIZE_ALTERNATE>, <SUBTITLE>) where it seemed sensible to capture information that had been free text inside entries.
